overview:
Leading significant and lasting improvements in areas such as sales, operations, pricing, project management, marketing, finance and training, Chris Hopf began Best Solution Company and PricingWire to do what he does best, help companies of all sizes create, recognize and capitalize on opportunities to achieve their full potential - everyday - every transaction.

For more than twenty years, Chris Hopf has worked as an owner, employee and as a consultant with small startups, mid-sized mergers and Fortune 50 Corporations such as Microsoft and United Technologies.

His experience spans a number of industries including retail, high technology, publishing, software, general and specialty contractors, industrial suppliers and wholesale distribution.
